title: How do I change my character name?
body: How do I change my character name? (My username is yaniv2627)

replies.body: If you mean your summoner name then you need to purchase a name change in the ingame store
i can delete my player and register again?
You can create a new account if you wish but this one wont get deleted no
But the problem is I can't select a user name will yaniv2627

Unfortunately, it is not possible to change/edit the Username for your account.  If you wish to have a different Username (the one you use to log-in with, NOT the one that is displayed) you will need to create a brand new account and will subsequently need to start over at level 1.  I apologize for any frustration or aggravation this may cause!
What if username is reported as inappropriate?
I have no problem start at level 1  I at level 1 problem is that I can not choose just using the same name (yaniv2627)

Yes because the username already exists, you will be unable to choose the same username and will have to pick a new one, the only way around that would be to purchase a summoner name change in the store to change the summoner name on this account to whatever you were looking to be known as

I think he's trying to ask how to change his summoner name. Let me lay it out straight.


You can change your summoner name (in-game display) in the shop for 1350 Riot Points. (Purchasable through "real-life" currency) This will change your display name when you're in game. (i.e. "ghcty has slain SparklyCats")

However you CANNOT change your username. (The username you log into the client with)You can restart an account at level 1 and can level it back to 30, however you cannot use your existing username. There is no way to delete an account all together. Riot did a summoner name sweep a few months ago, however they have not done a username sweep ever. (As to my knowledge)

I hope this helped! Any questions, just respond.
